urls.title: Exclusive: U.S. slashed CDC staff inside China prior to coronavirus outbreak
urls.description: The Trump administration cut staff by more than two-thirds at a key U.S. public health agency operating inside China, as part of a larger rollback of U.S.-funded health and science experts on the ground there leading up to the coronavirus outbreak, Reuters has learned.
